subject: Where is my package it’s been two months
description_text:
#ssn3201 what is going on I here good things from simsonn but my experience with u guys is lacking serious no sense of urgency I never received a product paid for key word paid. You took my hard earned money and nothing this is unacceptable. Get you shit together simsonn I get fucked over i keep on getting appologies and nothing after no one reaches out . Give me a refund I no longer want you product wether if it’s good or not this will be the last time I deal with simsonn directly. Don’t put a product out that u can’t meet demand and fuck over new customers give me a refund give me a refund I want a refund for a product I paid for and never received give me a refund thanks 

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi William Diaz-Santiago,    Sorry for the delayed response. We have processed your refund. Please check your account.
